mapper.select: SELECT brc_code AS brcCode, brc_name AS brcName, brc_local AS brcLocal, brc_addr AS brcAddr FROM BRANCH

SELECT BRANCH.brc_name, MOVIE.mov_korName, BRANCH_DAY_COUNT.brcCnt_clientCount, BRANCH_DAY_COUNT.brcCnt_saleTotal FROM BRANCH_DAY_COUNT JOIN BRANCH ON BRANCH_DAY_COUNT.brc_code=BRANCH.brc_code JOIN MOVIE ON BRANCH_DAY_COUNT.mov_code=MOVIE.mov_code WHERE brcCnt_date between #{brcCntDate1} and #{brcCntDate2}
